name: Dodge Club Pocket
synopsis: The underground ravers of Dodge Club invite YOU to play in their pixel dance party. Dodge the red hot fireball and electric spark in a variety of unique mini challenges, each one more wild than the last! As you play, you'll even unlock mysterious bonus content in the form of "presents", including new characters, comics by Linzb0t, extra music, and more. Speck and her raver friends can't wait to meet you, so join the club now on your Nintendo 3DSâ„¢ with Dodge Club Pocket!
